body_html:
@peterjc123 I am using Windows Server 2012 R2. So I just used the cmds since I have built it once #494 (comment)

d:
cd pytorch
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py
mkdir torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
cd torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
mkdir ATen
python  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/gen.py -s  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/Declarations.cwrap  ../../../../../../aten/src/THNN/generic/THNN.h  ../../../../../../aten/src/THCUNN/generic/THCUNN.h  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/nn.yaml  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/native/native_functions.yaml
cd ../../../../../..
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
python setup.py install

But now it failed: https://gist.github.com/magic282/773a0c43007f37d769b8f51ba8ba98d7#file-manual-build-L378

body:
@peterjc123  I am using Windows Server 2012 R2. So I just used the cmds since I have built it once https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/494#issuecomment-345184771

```cmd
d:
cd pytorch
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py
mkdir torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
cd torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen
mkdir ATen
python  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/gen.py -s  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/Declarations.cwrap  ../../../../../../aten/src/THNN/generic/THNN.h  ../../../../../../aten/src/THCUNN/generic/THCUNN.h  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/nn.yaml  ../../../../../../aten/src/ATen/native/native_functions.yaml
cd ../../../../../..
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
python setup.py install
```

But now it failed: https://gist.github.com/magic282/773a0c43007f37d769b8f51ba8ba98d7#file-manual-build-L378
